name: Spectrum
description:
If you love colours, you'll love Spectrum: a relaxing colour sorting game in three dimensions which tests your skill in matching tints, shades, value and hue.

The Challenge: to re-assemble the cube, putting each block in its place between the corners. You'll never play the same cube twice!

Features:
  • Infinite levels
  • Tools: Build Frame, Pop, Scooch
  • Save progress
  • Eject any misplaced blocks
  • Search through the floating blocks with vortex
  • Mistakes can be easy to find with an outline option

Compatible with Razer Chroma keyboards. VR gameplay coming soon
